body.name: Portable Washing machine 20Lbs Capacity Mini Washer and Dryer Combo Compact Twin Tub Laundry Washer(12Lbs) & Spinner(8Lbs) Built-in Gravity Drain,Low Noise for Apartment,Dorms,RV Camping, GREY
features: 【Twin Tub And 20LBS Capacity】:The portable washing machine has twin tub design for both cleaning and drying,saving your valuable time. With 12 lbs wash capacity and 8 lbs spin capacity,the washer and dryer is perfect for washing daily laundry quickly. Moreover, transparent cover allows you to check the washing/spinning process at any time. Constructed of High-density plastic body+ Aluminum pump+ Upgraded motor, it is well built for years use.

【Easy to Operate】:When receiving the portable washing machines,it can be used directly without assembly.And you can choose three washing modes according to your needs. Simply put in clothes and detergent, fill with water, set the timer and start washing/spinning, the washer and dryer can run at the same time. Equipped with a built-in drainage pump, the machine can quickly discharge the water from the tub. The filter device in the tub can also collect debris with a powerful cleaning function.

【Save Water and Electricity】:The semi-automatic washer and dryer is compact and low power to save a lot of water and power. The dual motor system of washer presents strong laundry power, which shows in the washing power (260W) and spinning power (140W).The True rinse technology delivers the best rinsing results ever, without wasting water.It is highly efficient and compact. You can still enjoy the good quality washing and drying from our washing machine and dryer.

【Separate Time Control & Noise Reduction】:The washer and dryer has separate timer control, which make laundry washing more convenient and efficient.The washer control timer runs for up to 15 minutes while the spin cycle timer runs for up to 5 minutes for each load. Its noise is not much, which is quiet enough for you to run the portable washing machine even at night.All the washers passed the noise test, so that it will not disturb your life when use it.

【Portable and Widely Use】:With a total weight of around 28.6 pounds,the portable mini washer and dryer can be easily moved and transported.The size of 24" x 14.5" x 29" inches is suitable for limited space.Lightweight and space-saving design for easy storage in apartments,dorms,RVs,bathroom or any other places.You can connect it easily to any faucet, whether it is at the kitchen sink or in the bathroom.
body.description: Portable Washing Machine A Convenient Tool for Your Life！ Our Twin-tub clothes washing machine is a good choice to doing daily laundry. The portable washer and dryer features effort-saving operation and water-saving design. With a easy-to-operate control panel, the portable washing machine lets you set your desired time and modes for versatile use. What’s more, the low noise and powerful motor consumes less energy and improves laundry efficiency. Get it for your better life! Dual motor: 260W washing power and 140w spinning power Washing tub(12lbs) and spining tub(8lbs) meets daily laundry needs Separate washing and drying functions can be controlled by different timer switches Detachable lint filter better collects lints in water Built-in drainage pump and extended drainage hose to quickly drain water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You know, I was a little bit skeptical, but this thing actually works. And if it continues to work this well it will save you a lot of money. If I had to do it again, I would have gotten the largest size, because the medium holds about 1/2-2/3 of a normal load.You might have to dry a couple of items at a time and it doesn't get them totally dry, but it spins really fast and your clothes come out just a tad damp and you can hang them in the bathroom for 20 minutes and they'll be dry. (the normal dryer cycle is an hour). The spinner doesn't hold much and it's not fully automatic, so there's some work on your part moving things around, BUT this costs a fraction of the price of a legit washer/dryer AND it gets your clothes cleaner!I am just hoping it doesn't break down the day after the warranty expires, like a lot of products on here, but I am already getting my monies worth.It's not quiet, but the sound is actually kind of soothing in a weird way.UPDATE: the hose you need to hook it up costs $30.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure if thise was going to work that well, but I'm actually genuinely surprised. This little thing is great! Fairly easy to use and kind of fun to watch! The little dryer part gets my clothes mostly dry and they're completely dry after about an hour or two hanging up. Overall I'm REALLY happy with this purchase. My one and only complaint is that the hose attachment doesn't fit my faucet, so I would have to buy an adapter. I've improvised and have been using a bucket to fill up the washer and I've read this way is actually faster, so it works out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There is only one size hose so it doesn’t fit to my sink faucet. I had to pour the water in by hand with a bowls (which took a ton of time). While washing or drying, it was extremely loud and would sometimes start rocking. The “dryer” really just spins water out and they have to be air dried the rest of the way. The whole process of doing one tiny load of laundry took about two hours between filling, running the wash, draining, filling, rinsing, then drying. I would try to return it but I’d have to pay shipping and it’s not even worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small But Works
reviews.reviewText: This is kind of small but surprising it actually works good The only thing I could say was I would’ve probably liked the spinner to be a little bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful purchase. Love it.
reviews.reviewText: This product has been the best purchace I have made for a long time. I live on the second floor, in a small apartment. Landlord will not allow us to have washers and dryers even though we have hook up for them. I am on disability due to a back injury from a car accident and carrying clothes, groceries, just about anything up and down these stairs takes me out. Having this may would get me evicted but I'm willing to take that chance to not go to the laundromat anymore. First time I used it I thought it was going to wash to color out of my clothes. They are cleaner than what they get in the front load washers at the laundromat. And Lord don't get me started on the spin dryer! No kidding the clothes come out of that thing with dry spots. I truly think you could dry something completely if you ran it for a few cycles. The only con for me is I wish it was a little quieter. Dont want my noisy neighbor reporting me. Going to try a rubber mat under it to see if that helps. Maybe play loud music while I'm using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice washing machine
reviews.reviewText: I currently live in a travel trailer. Bought one of these so I wouldn't have to go to the laundry mat. We use it daily and really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just a heads up!
reviews.reviewText: I like the performance of the washer but am unhappy with it because I didn't even have it 60 days and one of the knows broke and I have to hold it on place in order for it to work! I should've gotten a better quality made product!

reviews.reviewText: Funciona muy bien,exprime la ropa excelente,mi esposa quedó encantada,100 % recomendable.
